sub_title: Business Analyst | Translating business needs into actions | Building bridges among data and business solutions
summary:
	Phone number: +31 6 17616884
	E-mail: yerko.marcic@gmail.com
	Dutch Residence Permit.
            •	 Eligible to work in the Netherlands.
            •   Arbeid vrij toegestaan. TWV niet vereist.

A business driven professional with strong analytical skills. Business Analyst who builds bridges between technical data teams and the business while seeking for solutions. An analyst who brings improvements to the organization and is passionate about bringing a better customer experience, because there is always room for progress. An enthusiastic person who likes to contribute and make an impact on the organization. The key skills include:

Hard skills:    Microsoft Excel   -   Microsoft Power Point   -   Tableau   -   SharePoint   -   SQL
Soft skills:   Organized   -   Quick learner   -   Detailed oriented   -   Critical thinking   -   Problem solver - Communication -  Socializer
